channel.title: NPC Face creation
channel.description: I'm not sure if this counts as a question, but does face creation seem to be not in full effect for anybody else? I tried doing "npc_create" earlier and it looked like an army of clones, and even without that I've bumped into a lot of 'twins' throughout the mod so far. Is there something I need to put in console or are the differences really just that small?

item.title: NPC Face creation
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Well they said it’s randomize model face presets each playtrhough, and it seems like it work everywhere but Anomalous Materials, but of course you can still pick out many twins.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Face creation
item.dc:creator: snake-4c-merc
item.description:
I’m not sure if this counts as a question, but does face creation seem to be not in full effect for anybody else? I tried doing “npc_create” earlier and it looked like an army of clones, and even without that I’ve bumped into a lot of ‘twins’ throughout the mod so far. Is there something I need to put in console or are the differences really just that small?

Read full topic
